title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 8.1 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 8.1 - Policy

State Regulations

Members of an inmate's immediate family and the news media
generally have no special legal right of access to information regarding an
inmate. Nevertheless, the department seeks to be responsive to legitimate
inquiries from inmate families and the news media without compromising the
safety, security and good order of correctional facilities and applicable
law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
8.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
